name: The Gantlet
description: This is simply a correction in a Mission 3 that is a part of the IWAD. It seems the placed a thing or two, and a door or two and forgot :( to hook them up to anything else. You could believe that or not, but in hooking up the things and doors properly the level is more interesting. The only thing I did was change the sector tag on two sectors in a way that is logical.
